schema:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
   PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#> 
   PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/> 
   PREFIX pr: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/reference/> 
   PREFIX ps: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/> 
   PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
   PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#> 
   PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/wiki/> 
   PREFIX ent: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/> 
   PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/> 
   PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/> 
   PREFIX pq: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/qualifier/> 
    
   PREFIX ps: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/> 
    
   start = @<wikidata_item> 
    
   <wikidata_item> { 
       #statements 
           p:P31 @<P31_instance_of_programminglanguage>+ ; 
   } 
   # Shape expression for Wikidata statements related to programminglanguage 
   <P31_instance_of_programminglanguage> { 
       ps:P31 [wd:Q9143]; 
   }
dataLabel: get 10 items about programming language from Wikidata
queryMap: SPARQL `SELECT ?item ?itemLabel WHERE { ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q9143.   SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' } } LIMIT 10`@START
